protein.specific_function: Cleaves linear and branched multiubiquitin polymers with a marked preference for branched polymers. Involved in unanchored 'Lys-48'-linked polyubiquitin disassembly. Binds linear and 'Lys- 63'-linked polyubiquitin with a lower affinity. Knock-down of USP5 causes the accumulation of TP53/p53 and an increase in TP53/p53 transcriptional activity because the unanchored polyubiquitin that accumulates is able to compete with ubiquitinated TP53/p53 but not with MDM2 for proteasomal recognition

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
